Subskills.name: Bolts of Devastation
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by storm bolt.

Subskills.name: Beaming Cast
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of storm bolt.

Subskills.name: Pulsating Bolt
Subskills.description: Unleash a piercing and pulsating storm bolt with increased area of effect radius and damage.

Subskills.name: Expanding Storm
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile size of storm bolt.

Subskills.name: Static Explosion
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of storm bolt.

Subskills.name: Tiny Storms
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash multiple smaller storm bolts in a barrage.

Subskills.name: Shocked Steps
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using storm bolt.

Subskills.name: Quantity of Power
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to fire an additional storm bolt.

Subskills.name: Magnetize
Subskills.description: Pull all nearby monsters towards the target on hit causing a large electromagnetic explosion slowing and dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Unleash Discharge
Subskills.description: Chance to pull nearby monsters towards the target on hit dealing increased damage inflicting the target with lightning break.

Subskills.name: Storm Breeds Storm
Subskills.description: Chance to summon a small storm cloud for a short duration at target location on hit.

Subskills.name: Bouncing Bolts
Subskills.description: Storm bolts can bounce off of terrain multiple times refreshing its lifetime.

Subskills.name: Bouncing Charge
Subskills.description: Unleash a piercing storm bolt bouncing between nearby monsters on hit increasing the damage dealt with each bounce.

Subskills.name: Storm Claw
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash multiple surges of lightning in an arc towards target on hit.
